long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stick It - create and save sticky notes that are unique to each website you visit. Whether you're researching, shopping, or working on a project, your notes are automatically saved and reappear whenever you return to the same domain.

*FEATURES*

Domain-Specific Notes: Create sticky notes tailored to each website, ensuring your important ideas, reminders, and tasks are always accessible where you need them.

Simple and Intuitive Design: Our user-friendly, yellow sticky notes interface is easy to use, making note-taking a breeze.

Text Formatting Options: Use bold and italic text to highlight important points and organize your notes effectively.

Automatic Save and Display: Your notes are saved automatically and will reappear the next time you visit the same domain, keeping your online workflow seamless.

Productivity on Every Page: Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to keep their online activities organized and efficient.

Why Choose This Extension?

Our extension is built for people who want to enhance their productivity and streamline their online activities. 

Whether you're managing multiple projects, gathering research, or just trying to remember things better, our domain-specific sticky notes provide the perfect solution. 

Stay focused, stay organized, and make your browsing experience more personalized and efficient.
